channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fortnight to Election Day: 5 key 2025 races to watch
item.description: Rep. Mikie Sherrill and Jack Ciattarelli compete in a tight New Jersey gubernatorial race with polls showing a narrowing gap two weeks before Election...

item.title: The Rare Earths Travesty
item.description: It will take us years for the U.S. to make up lost ground in mining critical minerals, but this is a solvable problem.

item.title: Exclusive: David Tisch’s BoxGroup raises $550 million across two new funds as venture firm crosses 16 years
item.description: Tisch has invested at the early stage in Ramp, Cursor, and other tech giants.

item.title: We’re Not Having It
item.description: The violence from the left, the attacks on free markets, the rise of antisemitism — NR is fighting these trends, and we hope you’ll support us.

item.title: The Most Influential Family Advocate You Probably Hadn’t Heard Of
item.description: Karen Wright should be remembered in the pantheon of modern American heroes.

item.title: $50 billion fintech CEO says stop selling AI. Customers don’t care and ‘just want their problem solved’
item.description: The CEO of the largest digital bank says stop peddling new technology as your selling point.

item.title: This is the worst the jobs market has looked (outside of a recession) in 50 years, says Goldman Sachs, meaning bullish GDP estimates are too optimistic
item.description: Jan Hatzius warns America’s job market slump could drag down growth, with frontloaded orders and AI disruption skewing GDP signals.

item.title: Coach is winning over Chinese consumers with ‘American design,’ says CEO Todd Kahn
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Watch Margaret Hoover’s Justice Kennedy Interview To See Why Trust In Media Is At Record Lows
item.description: Margaret Hoover used her interview with Anthony Kennedy to attempt to discredit SCOTUS and bait the retired justice into attacking Trump.

item.title: Experts say the high failure rate in AI adoption isn’t a bug, but a feature: ‘Has anybody ever started to ride a bike on the first try?’
item.description: At Fortune's Most Powerful Women event, one thing was clear: We're still on the "jagged frontier" of AI adoption.

item.description: Leftist 'voter rights' groups are throwing all they can at stopping the EAC from changing the registration form to ensure only U.S. citizens can vote.

item.title: Trump’s Argentina Gamble
item.description: Extending money to the South American nation is risky but could help spur reforms that would create a prosperous, powerful American ally.

item.title: 60 Minutes Takes Left-Wing Propaganda To A New Level With Discredited Ex-DOJ Lawyer Interview
item.description: 60 Minutes tried its very hardest to portray Erez Reuveni as a courageous hero who was victimized by a lawless Trump-run DOJ.

item.title: Congressional leaders admit shutdown won't end anytime soon
item.description: Congressional leaders are acknowledging that the government shutdown has no foreseeable end as both parties refuse to budge.
